00021 template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
00022 class eGlue : public Base<typename T1::elem_type, eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type> >
00023   {
00024   public:
00025   
00026   typedef typename T1::elem_type                   elem_type;
00027   typedef typename get_pod_type<elem_type>::result pod_type;
00028   
00029   const Proxy<T1> P1;
00030   const Proxy<T2> P2;
00031

00035   };
